meanings.definition: Spandexes: garments made of a stretchy synthetic fabric
meanings.sent1: She wore comfortable spandexes to the gym.
meanings.sent2: The dancer's outfit was made of shiny spandexes.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's spandexes were so tight, he could barely move!
meanings.sent4: Her spandexes were like a second skin, hugging every curve.
meanings.sent5: The athlete's spandexes shimmered under the stadium lights.

meanings.definition: Spandexes: to wear or use garments made of a stretchy synthetic fabric
meanings.sent1: He spandexes his workout gear for maximum flexibility.
meanings.sent2: She always spandexes when going for a run.
meanings.sent3: The cat spandexes around the house, trying to imitate the gymnast.
meanings.sent4: Time to spandex up and hit the yoga class!
meanings.sent5: They spandexed their costumes for the dance performance.
